channel.title: My new car
channel.description:
Hi i recently passed my driving test im 17 and im now on the road,(SORRY IF I HIT YOU LOL) [size=20pt] woop[/size] im from the unkited kingdom so please dont cus my english car :)
[img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/7708/carphoto2215777.jpg[/img]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2009, 04:18:37 am[/size][hr][img]http://img104.imageshack.us/img104/3851/2436419958b4f50da022.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/2122/fordfocusst2205.jpg[/img]

item.title: My new car
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:57, topic:298189”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=394596.msg3004797#msg3004797 date=1256308363]

You just passed your test right? so your 17-18.

Unless your weird… Most jobs wont give you a good wage under 18… So unless your dealing… you have rich parents.

what? i get a good wage and im 17 i get ~£9.50 an hour

Doing what lol?

Student IT technician
[/quote]

Dont you get taxed alot?[/quote]
nope i work at a school and my tax code says i don’t get taxed

item.title: My new car
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:50, topic:298189”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=394596.msg2957328#msg2957328 date=1252913187]
The exterior is not the greatest but I have to admit that the wheels look great. On the other hand, I think the interior looks good because of the blend of both colours (orange and black), especially on the seats.

STROOOONGBOOOOOOOOW!

Or magners if you’re feeling like a posh nub.

Hmmm… Strongbow!

Nice car btw! It’s a typical Ford Focus colour, tobad it isn’t the RS version hehehe.

I believe red is the default colour for a focus. Orange looks a little gay.

I could not imagine a Ford Focus in red. I say an orange Ford Focus is typical.
[/quote]

the focus ST original colour is this orange i believe…[/quote]

Yes, it is. I mean, if you type in Ford Focus ST into Google Images, most of the images turn out to be orange Ford Focus ST’s, furthermore proving the point in hand.

Read full topic

item.title: My new car
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:44, topic:298189”][quote author=Waffendennis link=topic=394596.msg2955419#msg2955419 date=1252798630]

Holy hell, you can buy another car for that.

Hell yea :O!

How much do you pay monthly? I heard the insurance costs are insane in the USA.
[/quote]

I pay about $500 a year for 3 trucks and a car, that is with srt8 and I both being drivers on them.

When I first started driving however, I paid something like $600 a year for just my one truck. Young male drivers are the most expensive to insure.[/quote]
ha you think thats bad i get a quote on a ford KA on my own, no parents £2,000 per year, even with my parents on there and their no claims its still £1,100

Read full topic

item.description:
